name: The Edge of Space (PC-hris)
description:
In The Edge of Space, a black hole has exploded and is taking an entire galaxy down with it. You must run from the wall of death to a space station that will take you hundreds of light-years away to safety via a wormhole.

Controls:
Left mouse to shoot
WASD to move

Objective:
Shoot asteroids to collect metal.
Collect enough metal to upgrade your ship and jump farther.
Skim fuel from around stars.
Jump to the next star and do the same process over again.
Repeat until you reach the end.

Saving does not work between sessions in the browser so if you'd like to save your progress you'll need to download the Windows build.
